data.name: Shadow of Conquest
data.detailed_description:
Multiplayer / Singleplayer Top-Down Shooter, configured for team play in completely destructible randomly generated world, consisting of several layers.

Features:


  • Completely destructible terrain.
  • Using a Jetpack (the ability to move between parallel levels)
  • A variety of types of weapons (pistols, submachine guns, rifles, explosives, etc.)
  • Lots of equipment combinations for building your own game tactics (Medkits, ammo, invisibility, decoys, etc.)

  • Split screen mode to play with a friend online, on a remote server, from a single PC.
  • Effect of environment on the players (the change of time, weather, etc.)
  • Controller Support (XInput, Steam Controller)
  • Bot-controlled enemies practice mode.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Vista, 7
  • Processor: Dual Core 2,2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512mb Video Memory, capable of Shader Model 2.0+
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Additional Notes: If playing on a Laptop, please make sure it has a discrete graphics card.
